data.text: When things get better for us, I’ll try to pay back each and every one of those who donated! This means a lot to me and my family and I couldn’t have been more grateful for all of you 🥺❤️

I woke up today with puffy eyes and to more donations 😭♥️ the fact that these are strangers to me and people I haven’t interacted with makes me believe in the kindness of humanity huhuhu all of you guys are so sweet and kind, thank you so so much for your generosity 🥺 https://t.co/e31LxmfHi5

With all that’s going on, I received a text from Gcash with my first donation 🥺😭 huhuhu super thankful po talaga ako for this 🥺 thank you so much for your generosity po 😭♥️ may your kindness return to you a thousandfold talaga, ilysm 🥺 https://t.co/Y4t86dToTE

Typing this is the hardest thing I ever had to do. I am shaking. I never thought I would ever be talking about my sister this way. But I am knocking in all of your hearts talaga to please donate for her. Huhu retweets are highly appreciated 😞

I hate to ask for money especially here and especially na I’m a client who pays commissioners for commissions but I am at my lowest point na talaga. I’m leaving it up to the kindness of humanity to have it in your hearts to donate for my sister’s cremation, and her funeral.
